appLead: Upload your delivery slip scans to digitize them automatically.

fileUpload.dragOrClick: Drag images here or click to select
fileUpload.formats: Formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, WebP (max. {{maxSizeMB}}MB each)
fileUpload.addMore: Click or drag up to {{count}} more image(s)
fileUpload.addMore_one: Click or drag up to 1 more image
fileUpload.errorNoFilesSelected: Please select one or more files.
fileUpload.errorTooManyFiles: You cannot select more than {{maxFiles}} files.

messages.dataProcessed: Your data has been processed successfully.
messages.errorCopyFile: Could not copy the template file.
messages.errorGapiLoad: Failed to load Google services library.
messages.errorGapiTimeout: Google services library could not load in time.
messages.errorGoogleLoginUnknown: Google login failed for an unknown reason.
messages.errorGapiClientNotReady: Google API client is not ready. Please sign in again.
messages.errorAccessTokenMissing: Google access token is missing. Please sign in again.
messages.errorNoDataToWrite: No data was provided to write to the sheet.
messages.errorUnknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
messages.errorNetwork: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
messages.errorAIResponse: The AI service returned an unexpected response or no data.
messages.errorAISchema: The AI service response did not match the expected data structure.
messages.errorApiKeyMissing: AI API key is missing. Please configure the application.
messages.errorAIPromptMissing: AI prompt is missing. Cannot proceed.
messages.errorAISchemaMissing: AI response schema is missing. Cannot proceed.
messages.errorAIUnknown: An unknown error occurred while communicating with the AI service.
messages.errorAISchemaDefinitionInvalid: The provided AI response schema definition is invalid.
messages.errorAIJsonParse: Failed to parse the AI's JSON response. It may be malformed.
messages.errorAIDataTransformation: An error occurred while transforming the AI's data.
messages.errorTemplateTitleMissing: Spreadsheet title for the new sheet is missing.
messages.errorBatchUpdatePayloadMissing: Formatting instructions for the new sheet are missing.
messages.errorCreatingSpreadsheet: Failed to create a new spreadsheet file.
messages.errorSpreadsheetIdMissing: Spreadsheet ID is missing. Cannot write data.
messages.errorRangeMissing: Spreadsheet range is missing. Cannot write data.
messages.errorWritingToSheet: An error occurred while writing data to the spreadsheet.
messages.errorApplyingTemplateToSheet: Failed to apply template formatting to the new sheet: {{error}}
messages.errorNoJsonToCopy: There is no JSON data available to copy.
messages.errorCopyJsonFailed: Failed to copy JSON data to clipboard.
messages.copyJsonTooltip: Copy the raw JSON output from the AI to your clipboard.
messages.openSpreadsheetTooltip: Open the newly created Google Sheet in a new tab.

settingsModal.promptDescription: Define the instructions for the AI to extract data. (Advanced)
